verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329><s%> Musician, <S%H5329><s%> A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> of David. <S%H1732><s%> Hear <S%H8085><s%> my voice, <S%H6963><s%> O God, <S%H430><s%> in my prayer: <S%H7879><s%> preserve <S%H5341><s%> my life <S%H2416><s%> from fear <S%H6343><s%> of the enemy. <S%H341><s%>
Hide <S%H5641><s%> me from the secret <S%H5475><s%> counsel <S%H5475><s%> of the wicked; <S%H7489><s%> from the insurrection <S%H7285><s%> of the workers <S%H6466><s%> of iniquity: <S%H205><s%>

Who <S%H834><s%> whet <S%H8150><s%> their tongue <S%H3956><s%> like a sword, <S%H2719><s%> and bend <S%H1869><s%> their bows to shoot their arrows, <S%H2671><s%> even bitter <S%H4751><s%> words: <S%H1697><s%>
That they may shoot <S%H3384><s%> in secret <S%H4565><s%> at the perfect: <S%H8535><s%> suddenly <S%H6597><s%> do they shoot <S%H3384><s%> at him, and fear <S%H3372><s%> not.

They encourage <S%H2388><s%> themselves in an evil <S%H7451><s%> matter: <S%H1697><s%> they commune <S%H5608><s%> of laying <S%H2934><s%> snares <S%H4170><s%> privately; <S%H2934><s%> they say, <S%H559><s%> Who <S%H4310><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> them?

They search <S%H2664><s%> out iniquities; <S%H5766><s%> they accomplish <S%H8552><s%> a diligent search: <S%H2665><s%> both the inward <S%H7130><s%> thought of every <S%H376><s%> one <S%H376><s%> of them, and the heart, <S%H3820><s%> is deep. <S%H6013><s%>
But God <S%H430><s%> shall shoot <S%H3384><s%> at them with an arrow; <S%H2671><s%> suddenly <S%H6597><s%> shall they be wounded. <S%H4347><s%>
So they shall make their own tongue <S%H3956><s%> to fall <S%H3782><s%> on themselves: all <S%H3605><s%> that see <S%H7200><s%> them shall flee <S%H5074><s%> away.

And all <S%H3605><s%> men <S%H120><s%> shall fear, <S%H3372><s%> and shall declare <S%H5046><s%> the work <S%H6467><s%> of God; <S%H430><s%> for they shall wisely <S%H7919><s%> consider <S%H7919><s%> of his doing. <S%H4639><s%>

The righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall be glad <S%H8056><s%> in the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and shall trust <S%H2620><s%> in him; and all <S%H3605><s%> the upright <S%H3477><s%> in heart <S%H3820><s%> shall glory. <S%H1984><s%>
